website_summaries.verdict: A pricey cream that hydrates, fills wrinkles, and works to fade stretch marks.
pros: Users say they experience brighter, smoother skin with fewer wrinkles and marks
cons: It's expensive, especially considering there isn't a lot in one container

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for a great product ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt introduced me to Strivectin about 4 years ago and I have been using it ever since. I use it everyday morning and night and i have no fine lines or wrinkles at all and my face is so smooth. It may be pricy but I’m a firm believer in , you get what you pay for and this is worth every cent! You only need a pea size amount and mine lasts me 8-9 months ....
customer_reviews.author: RN79

customer_reviews.title: Surprise acne treatment!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Seriously. I was pretty concerned about spending this amount of money for lotion but I'm a believer. Not only has it helped my tummy stretch marks (used twice daily for three weeks so far) it totally cleared up my acne. I've suffered from bad acne since my early 20s (so about 15 years now). About four days after applying this it started fade. I apply once a day to my face (at night) and I've had NO breakouts since. Photo is not altered and I'm not wearing makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B Potter

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I used it religiously and it still didn't help at all. Pretty disappointed that I wasted my money on this. The only positive thing is that I didn't spend a lot more money on buying the big tube of it first.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: but my skin looks so much better when I use this
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it works, but my skin looks so much better when I use this. I wish it didn't, because it's just so expensive. But nothing I have tried so far gives me these results.
customer_reviews.author: radbadplaid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a while - always get compliments on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Creamburmese

customer_reviews.title: REAL RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Stri Vectin SD for 20 years and people always think I'm 10 years younger than my age. That's a successful skin cream!
customer_reviews.author: C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: I have used Strivectin for years! When the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Strivectin for years! When the product arrived, there were no instructions and there was no tiny aluminum foil over the hole opening. Also, it didn't have the Strivectin Peppermint scent. I'll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Girl

customer_reviews.title: amazing results in a very short period of time
customer_reviews.text: After trying dozens of wrinkle creams I am absolutely sold on the SD Advanced Intensive Concentrate, amazing results in a very short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Vance

customer_reviews.title: Not much product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but this is a very small amount of product. A lot of it stick to the insides of the tube. Have to cut the tube open and scoop it out!
customer_reviews.author: NinaJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had breast surgery and bought this for fresh torn stretch marks I got. A month later they were gone. It lasted along time too. I bought it in march and I still have half a bottle left I use it every day on my face now.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWNA DITCH

customer_reviews.title: This product does an excellent job of reducing the lines on my face - ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does an excellent job of reducing the lines on my face - especially on my forehead and around the corners of my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S.

customer_reviews.title: Used it before and was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product long ago and liked it. It takes a while of regular use to make a difference. So I don't expect immediate results.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this, I had deep creases that have actually gone away, and stayed away. I've tried to find a "generic," less expensive product that could replace it, but everything I've tried fails to work as well. I know it used to be a prescription only product, and therefore had extensive product safety testing, probably more than any other product on the market. Now I use StriVectin with a derma roller, and my skin has fewer red spots, dark spots, and visible blood vessels. I would bathe in this stuff if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Two Terriers

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to erase tiny lines forming around my eyes and those nasty ones around my lips. I'm 63 and I hate those lip lines. This WORKED. The lines around my eyes are noticeably gone and the ones around my lips are reduced, although not gone. I use before bed, when I get up and after I shower. As soon as it soaks into my skin, I add a moisturizer, because it feels better when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this StriVectin for years, and it works for me. Not all skincare works for all people. I have a lot of skin allergies, and this one has never bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger67

customer_reviews.title: This is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was first developed to combat stretch marks. Then, a beauty editor much smarter than I used it off-label. I have received no compensation or consideration for this review. It is a good idea to use a small amount on ta visage in the morning and before retiring for the night. If youthful skin is of interest, this is a great product for fine lines. BOTOX(R) is better, but hey . . .
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I’v Been using this for at least 4 years and the results are amazing. Tried other top name brands, but always come back to this. Day and night,
customer_reviews.author: Greta Snowden

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm 71 years old and unfortunately have spent a lot of time in the sun. I've been using this product for years and saw an immediate improvement in the small wrinkles around my mouth and chin once I started using it. I ran out once for over a month and saw those small wrinkles returning. I'll probably use Strivectin until I die or become to old to care!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my stretch marks. I didn't think they would every actually fade since my preggo belly was massive, but 6 months postpartum and using this twice a day and I've seen a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hageman

customer_reviews.title: I like the product, but it is expensive and was not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and will buy it again, I think. But Strivectin was originally an excellent product one could buy for under $100 and get 6 ounces. Someone got greedy and changed it to have one set for one (over $100 and only 4 ounces), one product for another, and another, and so on. I paid over $100 for mine and it did not have a seal. Further, it looked as though it had been opened and used. I tried to write a complaint to the seller, but that option doesn't show once it's delivered. Unfortunately, I didn't "open" it for a couple of weeks, but needed it immediately as I was out.
customer_reviews.author: notlad

customer_reviews.title: Into my 6th month using this product. I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Into my 6th month using this product. I am receiving complements about my skin. Wow!! Let's see how it goes in a year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my eyes water pretty badly.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t buy this again. Made my eyes water pretty badly.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item in macy's in the past. I bought it here because of the price but was very disappointed. Not only is the color off but there was no seal on it which was unsettling. I would not be surprised to find out it was a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing
customer_reviews.text: Smooths the surface of the skin leaving minor wrinkles hidden. Skin surface is soft and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Will fix the unbelievably dry skin on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Will resolve the skin that's so dr y on your feet that you think you will die from dryness. Its the only thing that works. It works so well that you dont care that it is stupidly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: MovieNut

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary wrinkle-smoother
customer_reviews.text: I've used Strivectin for years and really love it. Within an hour after I apply it, my face looks somewhat younger and more rested. Its effects don't last permanently for me, but that might be because the directions say to use it twice a day and I only use it in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: mla

customer_reviews.title: I SWEAR BY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Strivectin for more than 10 years and will not try anything else. I'm 48 y/o now and nobody believes me - they say I look 45; no wrinkles to date.. It's not expensive in comparison to it's competitors, which I have tried, and lasts a very long time (more than six months) because it's so concentrated that you only have to use a tiny bit. I highly recommend this product - it truly works, is unscented and leaves your skin feeling beautiful. I will never use anything else. I also swear by their tinted moisturizer, which I use over the Strivectin for some color and concealment. Stick with it, you will notice a change pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Wayne McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Stretch marks fading
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my stretch marks post baby and and really notice a difference. My stretch marks are already fading and my skin is overall looking more smooth! I will definitely be ordering more when it runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Lutfy

customer_reviews.title: What’s in my bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 5 years now. I can’t or won’t go without it! It’s amazing! You will love it! I’m 48 and get compliments all time that I look like 35! I’ll take that all day everyday ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Strivectin is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and love it. My face feels smooth and i do not have a lot of wrinkles. I recommend it for dry skin and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: mary smith

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 5 stars even though I only used it for five days. Goes on smoothly and no awful smells
customer_reviews.author: Colleen L

customer_reviews.title: Used for 15 days as directed
customer_reviews.text: I have lines on cheeks and area between my eyes, that I have been watching closely, while using. The product is a good moisturizer for me, as I have sensitive fair skin. I feel the lines (wrinkles) are fading and will continue using faithfully. Good product and would recommend other try it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER GREAT SRI VECTIN PRODUCT AVAILABLE IN TRAVEL SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: StriVectin is my product of choice for my (wah, aging) sensitive skin...this is perfect size for traveling...Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous night cream.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for 10 plus years. I love it and I don't want to anything else. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: fonzie

customer_reviews.title: Strivectin SD Advanced Intensive  concentrate is youth in a Tube
customer_reviews.text: I really like Strivectin SD, I have used it for about 20yrs ! I use the eye cream twice a day ! I use two different Strivectin SD moisturizer twice a day ! I also use something by Strivectin that goes under the moisturizer adds moisture to your skin !! Great product !!!!! Why do I use this product , well to look younger of course 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nan Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sample size
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sample size. The product is great been using for years.Would not be without if I could only have one product, it would definitely be my Strivectin!!
customer_reviews.author: Airam H

customer_reviews.title: Such a tiny tube!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of eye wrinkle products. This one works poorly. Lightens the skin under the eye a little, but does not help with lines or wrinkles. I doubt it has any Strivectin at all. The tube is incredibly small. Lasted only two weeks, so I can only tell you those results. Not recommended to anybody
customer_reviews.author: SuzeeqTop Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Strivectin for years. I don't know but the quality seems to be going down. Maybe the strength is changing of Retinol? Not sure but I know it is not producing the results it use to.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda  Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Have used this for years
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and my skin seems to have minimal if any wrinkles. I do add a moisurizer on forehead and cheeks when harsh weather causes excessive dryness. It's expensive, but a little bit can go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: maryz

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My 97 year old mother attests to its value. She says it takes decades off of her face (77?).
customer_reviews.author: Larry C

customer_reviews.title: Really moisturizes.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. I love it.It is expensive, but you get what you pay for. I have tried tons of other moisturizers over the decades (lol),but I always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I didn't buy a bigger tube. It didn't do anything for my stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Path-hong

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to see that at least 1/3 of the product ...
customer_reviews.text: No product seal. In holding it up to the light, it's easy to see that at least 1/3 of the product is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and do think it diminishes wrinkles some.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Brodie

customer_reviews.title: The Lady's Essential Face Cream
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? My wife uses this nightly and swears by it, even at its high price. Here I can get the largest container at the best price, and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Iatros

customer_reviews.title: Works but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for stretch marks and they have definitely lightened up but it’s quite pricey.
customer_reviews.author: JAY301

customer_reviews.title: Huge bottle, amazing results. I’m used this for 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years I can say this is my miracle cream I recommend to everyone. After a week you see results. Take a hot shower and scrub your face then get out and dab dry your face and apply. It will burn so good. This stuff works better than any other cream under $500.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor kalin

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AWESOME! finding the best price is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! finding the best price is a challenge, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The results are amazing. You notice the change in the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Brightstar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to be ok. To much money for the size of bottle
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Jaskulsky

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says, just wish it didn't cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton West

customer_reviews.title: Not sure on performance
customer_reviews.text: Smells and feels nice. Going to assume if you use it for an extended period of time, it works? This container is so small that I would just buy it to put in a travel case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Smallest Size Possible
customer_reviews.text: While I love the product, this is more of a sample or travel-size at best.
customer_reviews.author: Deb R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. I get told all the time that I look younger than what I am.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and takes time and repeated use to see changes in skin
customer_reviews.author: Harvest of Strength

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for MANY years! I assume it's doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: judi k.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a month and no results. If I had realized I could have returned it, I would have gotten my money back. Out that money and no results
customer_reviews.author: Gennifer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any results, I use it everyday for how many weeks now and don't see any difference!!!!'
customer_reviews.author: Jessa D.

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: can't live without. my skin looks amazing because of the StrVectin line
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D

customer_reviews.title: Use this cosmetic
customer_reviews.text: I like StriVectin, and use it a lot, with other anti-wrinkle products. Sometime, my skin will become immune to it and it doesn't seem to work as much, and I'll switch to something else, but I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a good all around basic moisturizer. I like it .
customer_reviews.author: natalie montana

customer_reviews.title: Strivectin is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this product,been using it for seven years,I would not use any thing else,it is great
customer_reviews.author: kathleen little

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: my skin did not react to this so its not "bad" but no results seen so won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amy MTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pricing is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Rating is based strictly on price as product is fine; how can the price nearly DOUBLE in a couple months? Would buy again at last price but now will look for alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is light and fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for several years and hopefully has slowed down the wear and tear of 50 years of too much sunshine!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nan Az

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before. I absolutely love it. It works, just like any cream you should use it daily to see results. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than any very expensive products so far. Will keep using/buying this. Highly recommended one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cream that really tightens and firms, and reduces wrinkles. No, really! Love this size which can go in carry on luggage, and plenty for a week or maybe two.
customer_reviews.author: Amadancer1

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and I’ve been using it for a year
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Huff

customer_reviews.title: return window closed too soon
customer_reviews.text: It takes around a month to see if a skincare product works. Amazon closed my "return window" on June 11, and this is June 19. So I'd like to return this product, but I can't. It used to work for me in my 50s, but now that I'm in my sixties, it only works on lines on my hands. I feel that with a wrinkle skincare product, Amazon's "return window" should be longer. Be aware of this if you order!
customer_reviews.author: CDL

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: When I run out of this, I will surely get more. Feels sooo good on my face.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Provias

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not seeing any improvement been using it for 1 1/2 months
customer_reviews.author: Momma M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste money. They also shipped to me very late ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work! Waste money. They also shipped to me very late and the service is too bad.!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This did help a little. Wish I could have seen more results.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. I have seen results. But wrinkles weren't so much my problem, so I liked even better the StriVectin tightening Face and Neck Cream.
customer_reviews.author: RJW825

customer_reviews.title: I love it going to get a larger size next time
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I kept looking for the original formula and then when I couldn't find it I finally figured I would try the new formula. I love it going to get a larger size next time. Use it on my face it seems to smoothe it out and make me look refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But does it work?
customer_reviews.text: I am not certain that it works as well as the old product it replaced. I think the price is too high for it
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect that I spent that much and it does not work. I feel even if I didn't use it there were no difference. I tried to return it but there is no way for return. Please do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a year. It's not a miracle but it does diminish wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Jake EEE

customer_reviews.title: After using every other product out there finally found StriVectin ...
customer_reviews.text: After using every other product out there finally found StriVectin. A product that works! At almost 70 my skin is brighter and firmer. This tube goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: I've been using for about 2 weeks and see somewhat ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for about 2 weeks and see somewhat of a difference in my skin. I can't wait to give it a few more weeks to see the results! I've used this product years ago...the packaging and consistency of the product did change, but seems to do the trick so far!
customer_reviews.author: Karen EdmondsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years but it is harder to find in stores. Only disappointment was the size of the product. Won't last long so it may be a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Madmaiden

customer_reviews.title: ... area you want to use it on it smells like black licorice to me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this because my gynecologist suggested this but I realize the sample size is probably too small to make a fair judgment the sample size lasted two uses depending what area and how big of an area you want to use it on it smells like black licorice to me
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skin product and I saw improved smoothness and firmness after using it for about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: crazywoman

customer_reviews.title: ... it's working so I'll continue to buy until I'm satisfied with how my skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've used this long enough to see real results yet but from what I have seen it's working so I'll continue to buy until I'm satisfied with how my skin looks
customer_reviews.author: AntRiz44

customer_reviews.title: found it to be very good for the small lines
customer_reviews.text: used it before, found it to be very good for the small lines....this is a good size if you don't want to spend $139........you only use a small amount and this should last awhile
customer_reviews.author: Maria Wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Used the product daily & got no results. Was not happy wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Eye Wrinkle Magic
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a sample with a store purchase and I decided to try it... So I started using it on the corner of each eyes and on my lid and the bottom because I started having fine lines ..But I see that using this redefined those line and made them a non factor ..So i had to get another sample to keep the magic going..
customer_reviews.author: Bentleybabee

customer_reviews.title: Sample
customer_reviews.text: It was as described. It was just a sample sized product. It has a peppermint smell which is not too overpowering. I got what I expected and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mchyna808

customer_reviews.title: But I think a good anti-wrinkle creme with it is helpful
customer_reviews.text: Strivectin has helped diminish wrinkles and prevent. I still use it every night. But I think a good anti-wrinkle creme with it is helpful. I would order it again
customer_reviews.author: Kari Wright

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job.
customer_reviews.text: This works nicely. I can see lines fading, and others are just gone. It's not greasy, and a little goes a long way. It doesn't work overnight, so you have to keep using it, and it doesn't take care of deep lines. But it does a decent job for what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: BEST SKIN CREAM EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the BEST SKIN CREAMS you can EVER buy. It takes YEARS off your skin and makes you look younger. Great for both women and men. It really works. I give it TEN STARS.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: The Price was right.......love the product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Strivectin for awhile and love the product . What I even love more about this purchase is price. The real deal at a very good price. I will be back for more. Thank you The Daisies.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pellicano

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: though it was smaller than I had thought it was still a reasonable price to try out the product before I bought a big one. Arrived quickly,
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen much difference in my face to this date. Maybe it is to early.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work so much for me... tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work so much for me... tried it for five weeks and saw zero improvement. Decided to stop as it wasn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Strivectin SD actually does work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Strive tin SD is one of the FEW products that really does make your complexion look younger.... This and Retin A (the .10 that you can only buy with a prescription) are the two complexion creams that I swear by. BOTH of these work like they say they do.....
customer_reviews.author: bbachmann

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I have used 2 bottles of this stuff it has barely worked. Not worth the price. I'm sure there is some herbal remedy that works better. Avoid this!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: StriVectin is the ONLY skin care product I will use on my skin. I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and am very prone to breaking out. This is the only skin care line that DOES NOT cause break outs, or leave my skin feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Used it before and works great. Too soon to tell for this application, but I think I'm getting some where.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Petersen

product_meta.title: StriVectin SD Advanced Intensive Concentrate For Wrinkles and Stretch Marks
product_meta.description: This anti-wrinkle face cream introduces their most potent combination of anti-aging technologies yet. Collagex-ce wrinkle repair complex and patented nia-114 combine to help transform the look of your skin.
